description: Add Only Flag. Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

VAT_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

VAT_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

VAT_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the VAT Group being updated. For new VAT Groups, this element will not exist.

validation.validation: Enter a VAT Group Name that is unique within a Country and not already in use.

VAT_Group_Data.description: The primary company of the VAT or GST group.

validation.validation: Add the selected primary company to the current effective date, or select a different primary company.

validation.validation: Enter a unique value for each effective date.

Effective_VAT_Group_Data.description: The companies in the VAT or GST group from this date.

validation.validation: [Company] is in another VAT or GST group for this country during this date range. VAT or GST group: [Group]
Select 2 or more companies. A VAT or GST group must have more than 1 company.
Change the companies in the VAT or GST group. You can't use the same companies as the previous or following effective date.

VAT_Group_Data.description: Data for the VAT or GST group as of a particular effective date.

validation.validation: You can't change a VAT or GST group when a tax declaration exists for the group in the date range.
